reviews.review: Unusual and one of the best.
всем играть

Плюсы:
+интересно продуманный геймплей
+забавные реплики, интересная атмосфера(И БЕЗ HALF-LAIF-а!!!)
+интрига с тортиком
+друг кубик

Минусы:
-уровни довольно простые(на решение которых уходим в среднем по 3 минуты)
-непонятно зачем приплели сюда Half-Life вселенную, сюжета в принципе нет, но это не мешает наслаждаться игрой
-единственный враг - автоматические турели, не беря во внимание финального босса ГЛАДОС-а
-очень короткая основная компания
-уровни скучные и простые

Ну и от автора сего обзора: Играть довольно интересно, в интригу нас вводят еще в самом начальном уровне, что заставляет идти по уровням довольно быстро0 не откладывая игру в долгий ящик. Ну и так как я брал эту игру на распродаже, и скидка была велика! Вложенных денег я не пожалел.
Couldn't even get off the game all night. Bought it and right away started playing. Amazing puzzels and story that gave me chills.
Круто четко заебись
crap
Jogabilidade ótima, desafios interessantes, uma personagem inesquecível e uma história muito legal. Com certeza se tornou clássico atual e ao jogar é fácil entender o porquê.
Still fun after all those years. Recommended!
kewl

Portal is one of the most fun and addicting PUZZLE games I've ever played. Normally I don't like puzzle games, but I was recommened this, and it's an awesome games. Not only is it puzzle, it has a hint of creepy and unsettling settings. One wrong turn, and you'll find yourself in a room with crazy scribblings on the walls. But I shouldn't talk too much about this game. BUY IT.
So worth it. 10/10
This game in no way let me down.
第一人称的解密游戏，很有创意... 终于入正版的了！

It started with my sister, her friend, and "Still Alive".  Then, my sister told me to pick up Portal 2 and I was hooked.  A year or so later, I log on to Steam for the first time.  Portal wasn't the first game I put on my wishlist but it was the first game I purchased. 

Short, sweet, and addictive, Portal is a game whose only downside is its length, or rather, lack thereof.  Now, my problem is if I need to get Portal 2 for PC.
잼있는데, 플레이타임이 너무 짧네요.
:P
This game took me away from playing repetative fps games and open my mind into new ways of thinking
Chama a Policia
Simple, yet challenging. And extremely funny. If you like puzzles, this is the game for you.
Do you want to play some good, difficult game? Portal is for you enough said... At least you should try it it's worth it 9.5/10
macht Spaß
그냥 깨기만 하는건줄 알앗는데 스토리도 있고 반전도 있네요! good!!

Uno de los juegos indispensables en tu biblioteca. Increible, tanto las voces como la jugabilidad. Si te quieres iniciar en los juegos de VALVE es una compra obligado junto con algun Half Life. Simplemente, una obra maestra
Great game! Really looking forward to Portal 2 this afternoon!

Best game ever. Short but darn fun. Played through all the challenges as well.
No cons to this game at all!

Хорошая вещь, чтобы пораскинуть мозгами и не заскучать от этого :)
Больше нечего добавить, все уже и так о ней все прекрасно знают))

The classic start to the sequel portal 2. Portal itself is a great game, both portal 1 and 2. Portal did seem a bit short, having completed the story mode 2 and a half times in ~15 hours. The plot is amazing with a neat twist at the end. It's an older game and the graphics are eh, but if you dont care about graphics its a good 9/10 for me. The first few puzzles are remade in portal 2, its something you should look at, its actually kinda freaky lol. Defiantly a game you need to try if you haven't, I'm sure you will enjoy it.

I am a hardcore puzzler so it did't take too long for me to complete the campaign. But after i completed that I found out there are more harder puzzles and challenges to take. so if you like puzzles and you don't have much money; i't worth it!

What i like the most is that I have a crappy PC (almost 5 years old by now) and still: portal runs very smooth.

The only criticism i do have is that there aren't very much extra puzzle's and the campaign isn't that long, and there is only single player support.
GLaD to say that portal 2 solves all those problems: having 9 chapters, a community full of level makers and there is a dual player mode.
sad to say that i do need to set portal 2 it's visuals to minimum for a smooth game experience.
i recommend this because its THE BEST GAME EVER MADE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
업적하는 맛이 쏠쏠하군요 ㅎㅎ
THIS GAME IS a very good game and im still playing it even tho i bought like  a year ago and i love making stuff like boom and guns with the pew pew addon u should downloaded IT !

誰でも一回はプレイしてみて欲しいゲーム。
今までこの手のタイプのゲームはやったことが無かったが、
ブログやサイトなどでおススメされていたので購入。
酔いそうだな～と思っていたが、それよりも面白い！
ひとつ解けるともうひとつ解きたくなる。かなりはまった。
awesome game
Excellent and fun puzzle/logic game
Corto pero muy bueno, ademas establecio las bases para su secuela, que es aun mejor.
Simplemente genial.
Un juego buenísimo, Portal 2 caerá dentro de poco...
Still awesome!
Nagyon élvezetes, szórakoztató játék.
chell reminds me of steve the crepper.

What can I say? This game actually proved to be quite entertaining. From tricky puzzles to that distinct tone of GLADos' voice (I think I spelled it wrong, but nevermind), you would find yourself really immersed in the game. The very concept of the game is quite simple, having very little learning curve.

The only thing about this game that bugs me is it's replayability factor, and the length of the game itself. Aside from that, this is an overall good game, I would give it about 8/10
Pretty solid game i r8 8/8 m8.
It's a classic, you can't go wrong. Seriously, if you don't find GLaDOS' sassiness hilarious you should probably see a doctor to make sure you haven't lost the ability to laugh.

I could make the joke that pretty much everyone will - and has, millions of times made - but no. I'm not going to lie, I started with Portal 2, and I loved it. When I finally got around to playing Portal, I sped through it - not really as difficult as Portal 2, but I enjoyed the story despite knowing it already. If you haven't played Portal already, you should.
I recommend you play this game, if you like doing puzzles, with lots and lots of portals. It may be a little difficult and frustrating at some points, but it's a lot of fun. :)
One of the best game I've ever played well roudned puzzle fps style game not to long not to short with a good amount of story to keep you interested and jokes to laugh at should be played by all
What can I say about Portal that has not already been said?  This fun puzzle FPS is unlike anything else.  Buy it, especially if you can get it during a Steam sale.
Now having finished this game, It is safe to say this is in my top 3 favorite games of all time. I cannot reccomend this any more than anything else.
One of the best games ever made.
Juegazo, 2 horas me ha durado, pero geniales, un must have sin duda.
classic game first of its kind
It gave me what I want in a video game plus even more with its comedy and a story to get you playing more.
Man this game tho...
I never knew I could love a polygon until I met Companion Cube . . . I MISS YOU SO MUCH ;_;
Amazing
Let's Play Portal 2!
Portal ist einfach nur lustig!
Get the orange part of the gun, fall in an infinite hole
O que falar desse jogo que conheço a tão pouco tempo e já considero pacas... uma das melhores histórias em um jogo que já vi, recomendadíssimo.

The greatest puzzle game I have ever played. WIth a new innovative and creative way of looking at things, Portal is definitely a game for puzzle-lovers everywhere. In addition to the memorable storyline and the built-in BTS aspects (there's two), Portal will surely be a popular game for many years to come.

Pros: Very fun and not so hard. Runs very well, innovative game where we use a portal device to finish each test.

Cons: Too short, u can beat the game a little bit more than 1h, and it dont have CO-OP :c (Portal 2 already have it XD)

Conclusion: The game is very funny, i really recommend u 2 buy, i have beat this game 3 times XD its very funny
Super fun game, great puzzle mechanics and the humor only adds to the game. Have this and the sequel, both are a blast.
A game that pulls you in, makes you think and has a good storyline.
8/8 good game m8
Really good fun, if not a very short game but hey, it has encouraged me to buy the next one
WORTH THE MONEY

Extremely good game, but quite short. Expect less than 4 hours to complete the main part of the game. If you're a completionist and like challenges, there is a lot of time to waste on the challenges and advanced puzzles. But after this, there is not a lot of replay value.
The Cake is a lie.. But not the gameplay! ;3
Getting skull fucked by GLaDOS never felt so good.

Compre el juego junto a "The Orange Box", es increible lo bien que me la pase, pasandomelo otra vez, una compra obligada para PC, muy ingenioso, mucho humor y una historia bastante "completa" (El entre comillas es por lo poco que se revela de la historia, y lo mucho que te tienes que ir planteando".  ¡Si puedes comprarlo hazlo!
Although a Bit short, a very good Way to kill a few hours.

The cake is a lie.
The awesomeness of this game is not.

Awsome puzzle game.
Even my wife enjoyed it. And she doesn't like gaming.

Who in their life has never dreamed of being able to make portals and travel through them... This game lets you use this idea and put it into action as you do many puzzles that require you to think. When I first bought this game, I couldn't stop playing it! I kept playing the game until I was able to beat each puzzle in a short time span. I actually love the idea and I will get Portal 2 eventually... I just love games that challenge me and tries to make me use my brain.   BTW... I would start with this game (until you get comfortable) and then just buy Portal 2 for more test chambers and fun! 
My Rate 9/10.
Foncez tant qu'il est encore en soldes !
Probably one of the most enjoyable games I have played in the past 10 years. Unique game play and compelling story.
Нравки:3

I have to say the same as everyone else said when the game was new. This game is awesome. Abit short (2-3 hours storymode) but at the same time that keeps it from becoming repetative. Also it got tons of extra gametime if you want to grind through the challanges, which are actually challanging.
Love it.

Graphic── 畫面：☆☆☆
Character──角色：☆
Scenario──劇情：─
Single player──單機：☆☆☆☆☆
Multiplayer──多人：─
Durable──耐玩度：☆☆☆☆
Feature──特殊賣點：FPS射擊遊戲＋空間益智。
Rating──整體給分：8/10


《Portal》──傳送門是款射擊益智遊戲。
主角手上擁有一把可以射出空間子彈的槍，
必須想盡辦法完成每一個區域的測試與試煉。
"Portal"  is shooting puzzle game.
Lead anyone has a space bullet shot gun, Must try to finish each area tests and trials.

畫面上與L4D差不多，算是精美型。
遊戲性高，可以嘗試各種方式過關。
就算過關後，也還有高等關卡以及挑戰模式可以選擇，
就連我這種不愛玩挑戰模式的人，都玩上一兩關了，你看看Portal多棒~XD
On the screen are similar to L4D, is fine.
High game, you can try in various ways to cross the border.
Even after clearance, still has high hurdles and challenge modes to choose from, Even this man play the challenge mode, play for one or two off, how good at "Portal" :))

遊戲時間不長，但要把高等關卡全部解決，需要不少時間。
劇情頗有意思，機器人說話的內容也很爆笑。
喜歡益智遊戲，又熱愛射擊類型，Portal絕對是你的首選。
如果我手上有獎項可頒，Portal絕對可以拿到「最有價值遊戲獎」。
推薦給猶豫不決的玩家，請連著Portal2一起打包吧~XD
Game time is not long, but to all higher levels, take a lot of time.
The plot interesting, the robot say are hilarious.
Like puzzle games, and I love shooting type Portal is definitely your first choice.
If I have prizes can be awarded, Portal absolutely can earn the "most valuable game Award".
Recommend to hesitant players. Please package "Portal2", too. :))
Det er et af de bedste spil jeg nogensinde har ejet!
What a great game
good game xxx <3

The cake may be a lie, but this game is not.  I really don't need to say much, Portal is a classic.  No one, not even at Valve, expected this game to become what it is now.  It had humble beginnings, it was just added at the last minute just so Valve could throw an extra title onto the Orange Box.  

The gameplay is one of the most creative I have ever seen.  The puzzles are great, and GLaDOS is great.  The game is very short, but that just means that it doesn't overstay its welcome.  There is nothing more satifying than completing a hard as shit chamber that you have been struggling on all day.  

All-in-all, I give it a solid 9/10; the puzzles are great and the comedy is hilarious, but the game is only 3 hours long.

Highly addictive,most of the time you will just feel like messing around, using portals to shoot down the GLaDOS cameras. It's quite fun. I would definitely buy it for yourself or as a gift for one of your friends.

Gioco veramente bello, che porta qualcosa di innovativo in un panorama videoludico ormai quasi morto. Le meccaniche sono molte, ma molto facili da comprendere e padroneggiare, inoltre con l'avanzare dei livelli la difficoltà inizierà ad alzarsi. Peccato per la poca durata, un titolo veramente ottimo e somo in attesa di poter avere un pc decente per giocareil secondo capitolo.
'S really good. That's all you need to know, at this point.

A great game! Was blown away with not only the gameplay and game mechanics, but the great back story to this game. Not going to spoil much since I hate spoilers, but its amazing how valve has the creative mind to link two of thier best franchises together to create a great product! I think everyone should at least give Portal 2 along with Portal 1 a chance to see why it is people RAVE about this game. I can almost guarantee it is better than any Call of Duty or Battlefield that people may consider to have "a good story."
This entire game is a gigantic and well-pulled-off plot twist if I ever saw one.

Прошел на одном дыхании. Очень радует концепция игры и такое необычное устройство как портальная пушка. Жаль нет других игр, основанных на применении порталов. Это ведь такой простор для выдумки! Побольше бы таких головоломок.

È straordinario! Il salvataggio automatico fa egregiamente il suo lavoro perché non rischia di farti rimanere bloccato. È mentalmente stimolante come pochi giochi, l'intelligenza artificiale ha un cinismo quasi gradevole. Sono lodevoli le nicchie che i precedenti "test" si sono arredati e la musichetta della radio è stupenda!
Have to say one of the best games ever made for puzzles. Short and worth the time.

Muy buen juego, que se lanzó en un pack de Valve como un extra pero a tenido un gran exito. Historia bien elavorada y escenarios no muy detallados, pero muy bonitos artisticamente hablando. La mente maquiabélica de Glados y sus comentarios zafios e inhumanos me parecen lo mejor del juego. Los puzles de la historia no son muy dificiles, solo hay que mirar bien el entorno, pensar, razonar y probar sin prisas. Es un dinero muy bien invertido que aunque pueda pasarce muy rápido, da un buen entretenimiento. 
Como cualquier juego hecho por Valve, esta muy pero que muy bien.

I love it! I'm stuck in one of the levels, but I love the level design and the physics underneath. Valve did a good job with this. 

I'm willing to bet Portal 2 is gonna be as good or better, but I haven't had time to play it yet, so we'll see :)
As awesome as I expected
très bon jeux même si les graphisme dates l'histoire elle reste excellente
Довольно хорошая игра
Companion Cube!!! :D 10/10
Оригинальный пазл с забавным сюжетом, который раскрывается во второй части игры.
